item.description:
The 12th Annual Manhattan Short Film Festival will take place the weekend of the Sept 24-27, 2009 at the Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Arts.

MANHATTAN SHORT, short for the Manhattan Short Film Festival is an annual event in which 12 short films are selected as finalists. These twelve short films (18 minutes or less) are then distributed to partnering cinemas in 5 continents to be screened and voted on the week of the Festival. Each member of the audience votes on the best film to win. This year all 50 States are participating in the film festival.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there in the lobby.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans
